Header.heading: Verify credentials
Header.description: Effortlessly verify credentials with Inji Verify! Just scan the QR code or upload it for instant validation, following the steps below.

Upload.format:
Allowed file formats: PNG/JPEG/JPG/PDF 
 File Size - 10KB to 5MB

QrCodePrompt.label: Scan QR Code
QrCodePrompt.description: Tap 'Scan' to start scanning the document or card with a QR code

ActivateCamera.label: Activate Camera and Position QR Code
ActivateCamera.description: Activate your device camera and hold the QR code within the frame to initiate verification.

Verifying.label: Verification in Progress
Verifying.description: The QR code verification is in progress.

QrCodePrompt.label: Upload QR Code
QrCodePrompt.description: Upload a file that contains a QR code

Verifying.label: Verify document
Verifying.description: Verification for the document or card is in progress.

ResultSummary.SUCCESS: Congratulations, the given credential is valid!
ResultSummary.INVALID: Unfortunately, the given credential is invalid!
ResultSummary.EXPIRED: Unfortunately, the given credential is expired!

AlertMessages.sessionExpired: The scan session has expired due to inactivity. Please initiate a new scan.
AlertMessages.qrNotDetected: No MultiFormat Readers were able to detect the QR code.
AlertMessages.qrNotSupported: QR code format is not supported.
AlertMessages.unsupportedFileSize: File size not supported. The file size should be between 10 KB and 5 MB.
AlertMessages.unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file format. Allowed file formats are: png, jpeg, jpg, pdf
AlertMessages.scanSessionExpired: The scan session has expired due to inactivity. Please initiate a new scan.

OvpErrors.invalidRequest: Please check your input and try again
OvpErrors.resourceNotFound: Something went wrong with your request. Please check and try again.
OvpErrors.requestTimeOut: The request took too long. Please try again later.
OvpErrors.uriTooLong: The URL is too long. Please use a shorter link.
OvpErrors.internalServerError: We're having trouble processing your request. Please try again later.
OvpErrors.serverUnavailable: The service is currently unavailable. Please try again later
OvpErrors.invalidVpToken: The credentials don't meet the requirements. Please check and try again.

CopyRight.content: Powered by Inji, a MOSIP product

CameraAccessDenied.description: We need your camera to scan the code. Go to your browser settings and allow camera access for this website.

Offline.description: Oops! We cant seem to connect. Check your internet connection and try again.
